label: 北家
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: The main branch of the Fujiwara clan. Descended through Fujiwara Fusasaki, second son of Fujiwara Fuhito. Because his home was north of his father's, he and his descendants were known as the Hokke (Northern Family ).
